articles.title: Kim Yong Il Meets Indian Global Steel Holdings
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Meets Indian Global Steel Holdings
 Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- Premier Kim Yong Il met and had a talk with the delegation of the Global Steel Holdings Limited of India led by Chairman Pramod Mittal which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.

articles.title: Scientists and Technicians Have Photo Session
articles.content:
Scientists and Technicians Have Photo Session
 Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- The participants in the national meeting of scientists and technicians in the era of Songun had a photo session at the plaza of the Kumsusan Memorial Palace, the sacred temple of Juche, on Thursday.
					 Attending the session were senior party and state officials.

articles.title: State Academic Degrees and Titles Awarded to Intellectuals
articles.content:
State Academic Degrees and Titles Awarded to Intellectuals
 Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- State academic degrees and titles were awarded to intellectuals with due ceremony on Thursday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The title of candidate academician was awarded to Won Tong Jin, director of the Orthopedic Hospital under the Korea General Red-Cross Hospital, and others, the degree of professor to Ri Jo Yang, head of a department of Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering, and doctorate to Choe Jin Gun and Hong Song Bok who are researchers at the February 8 Vinalon Complex, and Kim Yong Chol, room chief of Kim Chaek University of Technology, and others and the degree of associate professor to 25 intellectuals in recognition of their great successes made in scientific researches and the education of the rising generation and their contributions to the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: New School Year Begins
articles.content:
New School Year Begins
 Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- A new school year for Juche 99 (2010) has begun in the DPRK.
					 Good preparations were made in different parts of the country to provide teaching aids and furnishings, facilities for experiments and practices, equipment for physical culture and sports and entertainment, school fixtures, etc. to schools as required by the age of IT. 
					
					 Opening ceremonies took place at universities, colleges and secondary and primary schools across the country on Thursday.
					
					 Newcomers were warmly welcomed by officials of party and power organs, teachers and students and their parents at Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Kim Ki Song Hoeryong Secondary School No. 1, Sojung Secondary School in Rakwon County, Kim Song Ju Primary School and other educational institutions at various levels.
					
					 At the end of the ceremonies, the first classes of the new school year took place.

articles.title: Efficacious Medicines Developed
articles.content:
Efficacious Medicines Developed
 Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- The Natural Medicine Research Institute of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has of late developed medicines with natural Koryo medicinal materials.
					 Alposin, a nutritive liquid better than well-known Albesin, has a virtue for unconsciousness, poor appetite, weakness before and after operations and acute and chronic wasting diseases.
					
					 The institute has also manufactured capsules with earthworm, potent for preventing thrombus, and an injection for curing acute and chronic rheumatic arthritis and pains caused by various diseases.
					
					 It is now deepening research into the pharmacological actions of hypericum to develop a sedative and into the separation of pigments from natural plants to use them for the production of medicines and foodstuffs.

articles.title: Jaeryong Mine Buckles Down to Technical Remodeling
articles.content:
Jaeryong Mine Buckles Down to Technical Remodeling
 Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- The Jaeryong Mine located in Jaeryong County, South Hwanghae Province in the western part of Korea is one of the country's major iron ore producers.   
					 The mine has directed efforts to technical remodeling of its equipment. Recently it completed a computer-controlled iron ore transport system to raise the transport capacity 1.2 times.   
					
					 Technicians and workers of the mine have also developed a comprehensive monitoring and control system of skips.  
					
					 Thus stopes of the mine have boosted production to overfulfill their plan for the first quarter of the year. 
					
					 The mine, with a large deposit of high-grade iron ore, has contributed to the development of the country's metal industry.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces Conservative Media of S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces Conservative Media of S. Korea
yongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a signed commentary denounces Chosun Ilbo, Dong-A Ilbo and other conservative media for becoming trumpeters for the south Korean conservative ruling group in a bid to help them revive the fascist dictatorship and incite confrontation with fellow countrymen and a war.
					 Those conservative media are busy zealously defending the unpopular and anti-reunification policies of the authorities and, at the same time, staging a malignant smear campaign against the DPRK, persistently defiling its just measures.
					
					 Some media of south Korea are acting waiting maids of the authorities. They are just echoing sheer jargons let loose by the conservative ruling forces calling for dependence on outside forces and confrontation with fellow countrymen, shutting their eyes to justice and truth, pursuant to their policies. This behavior cannot be interpreted otherwise than a sort of betrayal.
					
					 The above-said media organizations which should lead the times and speak for the public mind-set and justice and truth are playing the role of a shock brigade in defending the group of traitors and staging a smear campaign against fellow countrymen after being reduced to trumpeters for the group, rebuffed by the public for yielding to the dictatorship. Nothing is more shameless than this act of abandoning their faith as media persons.
					
					 It is self-evident that the above-mentioned media can never be genuine media for the nation as they are playing the role of trumpeters for the group of traitors, utterly indifferent to the interests of the nation.
					
					 Any media person desirous of independence, democracy and reunification should lift his voice of justice for social progress, democracy, reunification and patriotism in strong protest against the conservative group's moves to turn media into its tools.
					
					 If the reactionary conservative media of south Korea persist in their acts of treachery as wicked servants for the fascist dictators, this will only precipitate their own ruin.
					
					 The above-said conservative media and hack writers of south Korea would be well advised to face up to the reality, properly foresee the future and behave with discretion.

articles.title: Radical Improvement of People's Living Called for
articles.content:
Radical Improvement of People's Living Called for
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- All the people should unite close around General Secretary Kim Jong Il and dynamically accelerate the on-going advance for a great surge to materialize President Kim Il Sung's noble idea of believing in people as in Heaven and thus glorify this significant year as a year of great prosperity to be recorded long in the history of the country, urge papers Thursday in their editorials.
					 Rodong Sinmun says: 
					
					 Kim Il Sung is the eternal sun of Juche and benevolent father of the people who devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of its people, always finding himself among them, regarding it as his noble maxim to believe in people as in Heaven. 
					
					 The undying exploits performed by Kim Il Sung for the people lie in that he built best socialism centered on the popular masses which firmly guarantees a worthy life and happiness of the Korean people and laid a solid foundation for the prosperity of all generations to come with his clairvoyant wisdom and energetic revolutionary practices, the daily notes, and goes on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung's noble idea and cause for the people are becoming a brilliant reality thanks to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It is the unshakable resolution and will of Kim Jong Il to bring about radical changes in improving the people's standard of living this year which marks the 65th anniversary of the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea and open a gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation without fail in 2012, the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is making indefatigable forced marches for field guidance, setting forth scientific strategy and tactics for the building of a thriving nation and giving free reign to the mental power of all service personnel and people. This dynamic guidance provides a sure guarantee for winning a great victory in the drive for significantly improving the people's standard of living.  
					
					The on-going campaign for a significant improvement in the people's standard of living is sure to be crowned with success as Kim Jong Il is leading the drive to build a thriving nation with the most ardent love for the country and its people and indomitable revolutionary spirit and extraordinary energy.
					
					 Minju Joson calls for translating the desire of Kim Il Sung into a brilliant reality by victoriously concluding the drive for radically improving the people's standard of living.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization against Policy to Destroy Trade Unions
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization against Policy to Destroy Trade Unions
 Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the Transport Industry Trade Union of south Korea at a news conference held in Seoul on March 25 declared actions against the puppet authorities' policy to destroy trade unions.
					 He said that the Transport Industry Trade Union like the Government Employees' Union, the Teachers Trade Union and the Construction Workers' Union is being harshly suppressed by the authorities. 
					
					 He accused the authorities of getting frantic in their moves to destroy the Transport Industry Trade Union for the mere reason that the Freight Workers' Solidarity is affiliated to it and cracking down upon democratic forces by retrogressively revising various kinds of laws and mobilizing all power machines including the prosecution and police.
					
					 This reality compels the trade union to come out in actions, he held, declaring that the organization would call a general strike in April to achieve democracy and defend the trade union and thus protect the workers' right to existence.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by African and Indian Committee
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by African and Indian Committee
 Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- Kamwiziku Octave, secretary general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea,  and Harising Khang, member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist), issued statements on Mar. 24 and 25 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 Kamwiziku Octave in his statement praised President Kim Il Sung as a gifted thinker-theoretician and strategist and the great leader who built the people-centered socialist system in Korea.
					
					 It is an urgent task for the African countries to study and disseminate the Juche idea fathered by the President and apply it in practice, the statement said, expressing the determination to strive to learn from the immortal Juche idea and widely disseminate it to the African region in the future, too.
					
					 Harising Khang noted in his statement that the Korean people commemorate April 15, the birthday of Kim Il Sung, as the Day of the Sun, holding him in high esteem as the eternal President of the DPRK. The President will always live in the hearts of the Korean people and the world's progressive people, he added.
					
					 The statement hoped that the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people would register greater successes in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the WPK, holding high the banner of independence against imperialism.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con Ali Bongo Ondimba
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con Ali Bongo Ondimba
Pyongyang, 1 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 30 en la Presidencia de Gabon las conversaciones entre el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, y el presidente de la Republica Gabonesa, Ali Bongo Ondimba.
					En la ocasion el presidente gabones senalo que desarrollar invariablemente las relaciones de amistad con la RPDC es la posicion de su gobierno y destaco que siempre apoyaria la causa de la reunificacion independiente y pacifica de Corea.
					
					Deseo al pueblo coreano grandes exitos en su lucha por la construccion de la gran potencia prospera y el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo.
					
					En las conversaciones, ambas partes intercambiaron las opiniones sobre el problema de consolidar los lazos de amistad entre los dos paises y desarrollar mas las relaciones bilaterales y otros asuntos de interes mutuo.
					
					Participaron en ellas por la parte coreana, el ministro de Salud Publica, Choe Chang Sik, el vicecanciller, Kim Hyong Jun, el viceministro de Comercio Exterior, Ri Myong San y el embajador coreano acreditado en Gabon, Ri Myong Chol, y por la gabonesa, el premier de Gabon, Paul Biyoghe Mba, el ministro de Asuntos Exteriores, Cooperacion Internacional y Francofono, Paul Toungui, el ministro de Salud Publica, Asuntos Publicos y Familias, Alphonsine Mbie Nna, el ministro de Economia, Comercio Exterior, Industria y Turismo, Magloire Ngambia y el embajador gabones en la RPDC, Emmanuel Allo.
					
					Las conversaciones transcurrieron en un ambiente amistoso.

articles.title: Conferencia Nacional de Cientificos y Tecnicos de la Epoca del Songun
articles.content:
Conferencia Nacional de Cientificos y Tecnicos de la Epoca del Songun
Pyongyang, 1 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar la vispera en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la Conferencia Nacional de Cientificos y Tecnicos de la Epoca del Songun.
					Al acto asistieron Kim Yog Il, Jon Pyong Ho, Choe Thae Bok y otros cuadros, funcionarios directivos  de las instituciones del partido, la administracion y la economia, funcionarios de organismos, empresas y granjas de las provincias, ciudades y distritos, cientificos y tecnicos destacados y la delegacion de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon.
					
					  Antes de la conferencia, los participantes escucharon por medio de grabacion el discurso del Presidente Kim Il Sung "Tareas de los cientificos y los tecnicos en la revolucion tecnica" pronunciado el 22 de marzo del 52 (1963) de la Era Juche en la conferencia de cientificos y tecnicos.
					
					  El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicepremier  del Consejo de Ministros O Su Yong quien dijo en particular:
					
					  El Dirigente Kim Jong Il presento la linea de dar importancia a la ciencia y tecnologia como la estrategica de la construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista y dirigio sabiamente la lucha por su materializacion.
					
					  En su obra "Para materializar estrictamente la linea del Partido de dar importancia a las ciencias y tecnicas" ilumino claramente la direccion y el remedio para desarrollar con rapidez las ciencias y tecnicas del pais, hizo reinar el ambiente de dar importancia a ellas en todo el pais y preparo firmemente las poderosas fuerzas cientificas y tecnicas y sus bases materiales.
					
					  Gracias a la sabia direccion del Dirigente Corea pudo tomar con firmeza la arteria de la tecnologia CNC y desarrollar energicamente la lucha por tomar la hegemonia de lo todo conquistando la maxima cumbre tecnologica conforme a la epoca de IT.
					
					  Y se refirio al gran cambio logrado en este domino y continuo:
					
					  Todos los cientificos y tecnicos deben saltar mas alto y rapido explorando la tecnologia de punta conforme a la demanda de la epoca de la economia intelectual y hacer un gran aporte al desarrollo cientifico-tecnico del pais. 
					
					  Los oradores dijeron que solucionaran satisfactoriamente los problemas cientificos y tecnicos que se presentan para mejorar la vida del pueblo y desarrollar la economia nacional en su conjunto y llevar al nivel mas alto las ciencias y tecnicas del pais de acuerdo con la demanda de la epoca de la economia intelectual para asi contribuir activamente a manifestar con vigor el poderio de Corea del Songun.
					
					  En la conferencia fue aprobado el llamamiento a los cientificos y tecnicos de todo el pais.
					
					  El llamamiento senala que los cientificos y tecnicos, con grandes logros cientificos y tecnicos, deben contribuir a la solucion de los problemas de alimento, vestido y alojamiento.
					
					  Enfatiza que tienen que convertir con firmeza la economia del pais en la de forma cientifico-tecnica que se basa en la tecnologia CNC y otras ciencias y tecnicas de punta, hacer que la economia nacional independiente de Corea tenga la capacidad de competencia mundial en todos los dominios y tomar la hegemonia mundial en todos los dominios, finaliza.

articles.title: Otorgados titulos academicos y grados docentes a intelectuales
articles.content:
Otorgados titulos academicos y grados docentes a intelectuales
Pyongyang, 1 de abril (ATCC) -- Con motivo del Dia de Sol (15 de abril, cumpleanos del Presidente Kim Il Sung), fueron otorgados los titulos academicos y grados docentes estatales a los hombres intelectuales quienes alcanzaron grandes exitos en el estudio cientifico y la educacion a las generaciones venideras e hicieron aporte a la prosperidad de la patria.
					Fue otorgado el titulo de candidato al academico a Won Tong Jin, director del Hospital Traumatologico del Hospital Universal de la Cruz Roja de Corea y otros.
					
					Ademas, fue investido con el grado docente de profesor a Ri Jo Yang, jefe de la catedra de la Universidad de Maquinaria de Pyongyang.
					
					Tambien, se dio el titulo academico de doctor a los investigadores Choe Jin Gun y Hong Song Bok, del Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero, al jefe de oficina de estudio de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, Kim Yong Chol, y otros, y el grado docente de subprofesor, a los 25. 
					
					La ceremonia de entrega tuvo lugar el dia primero.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia medios de prensa conservadora de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia medios de prensa conservadora de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 1 de abril (ATCC) -- El periodico Rodong Sinmun publico el dia primero un comentario individual condenando "Chosun Ilbo", "Dong-A Ilbo" y otros medios de prensa conservadores del Sur de Corea que se han convertido en trompeteros venales para resucitar la dictadura fascista de la banda conservadora surcoreana e inculcar el enfrentamiento fratricida y la provocacion de guerra.
					  Ahora, dichos medios de prensa abrigan extremadamente las politicas antipopulares y anti-reunificacion de las autoridades y denigran perversamente las justas medidas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, senala el comentarista y continua:
					
					  Unos medios de prensa surcoreana, al obedecer a las fuerzas de dictadura fascista, dan espaldas a la justicia y la verdad y sirven de lacayunas de las autoridades repitiendo como papagayo las tonterias dependientes de las fuerzas foraneas y de enfrentamiento fratricida de que hablan las fuerzas conservadores en el poder, lo cual es un acto traidor.
					
					  Los medios de prensa deben ser precursor de la epoca, portavoz de la opinion publica y defensor de la justicia y la verdad.
					
					  Pero, doblegados a la dictadura, se convierten en trompeteros venales de las autoridades conservadoras desempenando el papel de brigada en la campana intrigante favorable a la banda traidora y contra los connacionales.
					
					  Resulta evidente que los medios de prensa, que juegan el papel del trompetero de la banda traidora sin distinguir ni intereses de la nacion, no podran servir verdaderamente a la nacion. 
					
					  Si aspiran a la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion, los publicistas deben elevar las voces de justicia por el progreso social, la democracia y el patriotismo por la reunificacion haciendo frente a las maniobras de la banda conservadora para convertir los medios de prensa en los progubernamentales.
					
					  Si ellos siguen tomando el camino de traicion siendo lacayos de la dictadura fascista, aceleraran solo su autodestruccion.
					
					  Los medios de prensa conservadora y periodistas venales del Sur de Corea deben ver correctamente la realidad y el futuro y actuar con prudencia.
